transcript_chunks.text: 10 things Starfield doesn't tell you you can fast travel anywhere on any Planet by dropping a pin while orbiting your companion can be a Pack meal so keep that in mind when you're over encumbered speaking of which you can store things in your ship cargo by going to this little screen on the wall you can change your look at this facial reconstruction place over in neon it has all the character creator options including the ability to update your name there are drinks that you can buy that increase your chances of successfully persuading someone similarly if you're missing the vat system getting high slows down time turning your scanner on in space gives you the view of all the places you can travel you can also land directly on locations this way need to buy a ship or modify your ship go to new Atlantis in the Alpha Centauri system and talk to this guy right where you land if you need any type of workbench to upgrade your weapons outfits and more go to the basement in the lodge located

new Atlantis in the Alpha Centauri system and talk to this guy right where you land if you need any type of workbench to upgrade your weapons outfits and more go to the basement in the lodge located on new Atlantis if you're looking for specific materials to upgrade your items you can go to our workbench highlight the upgrade you want then Mark the material so you can keep track of them for more on Starfield check out youtube.com kind of funny games for now here's
